Config.name: query
Config.value: select h_cls, h_idx, alias, p_cls, p_idx from ALIAS_MAPPING_DEVICE_VIEW where $(alias: DS_VIEWER_ALIAS_SEARCH_DATA.ALIAS) and active in ('A', 'Y') order by alias

Config.name: additional_constraints
Config.value: switch_sheet_cls in (3106) AND completed_in_range = 'Y' AND state_key not in (&Deleted;)

Visible.when: (!USER_FULL_OPERATIONS or !USER_TROUBLE_MAINTENANCE or !USER_CREW_OPERATIONS or !USER_VIEW_ONLY ) and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.WEB_SWITCHING_ENABLED == 'true' and ( DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;') and !USER_LIMITED

(!USER_FULL_OPERATIONS or !USER_TROUBLE_MAINTENANCE or !USER_CREW_OPERATIONS or !USER_VIEW_ONLY) and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.WEB_SWITCHING_ENABLED == 'true' and (DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' or DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE == '&UserSwitchingRequest;') and !USER_LIMITED

DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.ENV == 'WEB' and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' and (USER_ADMIN or USER_TRAINER or DEMO_LICENSED or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING_AND_SCADA_CONTROL)
DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.ENV == 'WEB' and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' and USER_TRAINER or USER_ADMIN
DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.ENV == 'WEB' and !USER_VIEW_ONLY and !USER_TROUBLE_MAINTENANCE and !USER_CREW_OPERATIONS and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;'
AMR_LICENSED and ((!USER_LIMITED and !USER_ENGINEERING and !USER_CREW_OPERATIONS and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingRequest;') or USER_TROUBLE_MAINTENANCE)
POWERFLOW_LICENSED and (USER_VIEW_ONLY or USER_ADMIN or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS or USER_ENGINEERING or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING_AND_SCADA_CONTROL)
POWERFLOW_LICENSED and (USER_VIEW_ONLY or USER_ADMIN or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS or USER_ENGINEERING or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING_AND_SCADA_CONTROL)
FLM_LICENSED and (USER_TRAINER or USER_VIEW_ONLY or USER_ADMIN or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS)

POWERFLOW_LICENSED and (USER_TRAINER or USER_ADMIN or USER_ENGINEERING or USER_VIEW_ONLY or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING_AND_SCADA_CONTROL)
POWERFLOW_LICENSED and (USER_TRAINER or USER_ADMIN or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS or USER_ENGINEERING or USER_VIEW_ONLY or USER_FULL_OPERATIONS_PLUS_SWITCHING_AND_SCADA_CONTROL)
DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.WEB_SWITCHING_ENABLED == 'true' and FLISR_LICENSED and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' and !USER_LIMITED
DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.WEB_SWITCHING_ENABLED == 'true' and FLA_LICENSED and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' and !USER_LIMITED
DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.WEB_SWITCHING_ENABLED == 'true' and VOLT_VAR_LICENSED and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' and !USER_LIMITED
DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.WEB_SWITCHING_ENABLED == 'true' and POWERFLOW_LICENSED and DS_LOGIN_ENTRY.TYPE != '&UserSwitchingEntry;' and !USER_LIMITED
(FLM_LICENSED or FLISR_LICENSED or VOLT_VAR_LICENSED or DERMS_LICENSED or ANMS_LICENSED) and !USER_LIMITED

DataStoreClass.name: DS_EX_TBL
DataStoreClass.query: select am.alias,f1.feeder_name as feeder1,f2.feeder_name as feeder2,f2.color from att_switch a, feeders f1, feeders f2, alias_mapping am where a.active='Y' and a.feeder_id_1 != 'Null' and a.feeder_id_2 != 'Null' and a.feeder_id_1!=a.feeder_id_2 and a.feeder_id_1=f1.feeder_name and a.feeder_id_2=f2.feeder_name and f1.feeder_name != f2.feeder_name and f1.color=f2.color and a.h_cls=am.h_cls and a.h_idx=am.h_idx and am.active='Y' union all select am.alias,f1.feeder_name as feeder1,f2.feeder_name as feeder2,f2.color from att_dynamic_protect_dev a, feeders f1, feeders f2, alias_mapping am where a.active='Y' and a.feeder_id_1 != ' Null' and a.feeder_id_2 != 'Null' and a.feeder_id_1!=a.feeder_id_2 and a.feeder_id_1=f1.feeder_name and a.feeder_id_2=f2.feeder_name and f1.feeder_name != f2.feeder_name and f1.color=f2.color and a.h_cls=am.h_cls and a.h_idx=am.h_idx and am.active='Y'
